Shivah::

"Bright" said Shivah"He attraped my master... killed my sister, 
Alecto, and insult us... I like his head"and looking to 
shadowstar"What's your price?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> SS chuckled at the thought of ANY Predicon, Decpticon,

> 
> SS:  Very well.  Name an enemy and you shall have his
> head in your hands to mock before the sun sets.
>
